alert.note: Alert for Coastal Camden; Inland Camden (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 16 at 5:56AM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...LOCALLY DENSE FOG EARLY THIS MORNING... Locally dense fog has developed for locations along and north of the Interstate 10 corridor. This fog may expand slightly further south through sunrise. Given the nature of the fog, visibilities on area roadways may fall to less than one half mile at times. Fog is expected to dissipate during by the mid morning hours. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... The nature of this morning`s fog is such that visibilities will vary greatly over short distances. Motorists should be alert for rapidly changing conditions through sunrise. Slow down and leave extra distance ahead of your vehicle in case a sudden stop is needed.
